content: elegant with a pop of texture these bobble stitch napkin rings will hold your napkins securely while adding just the right amount of sophistication to your tabletop decor this crochet napkin ring pattern would make a great addition to any modern tableware placement and is easy to make *please note*-- this listing is for a pdf pattern written in english not a finished product **what s included ** a 4-page pdf including written pattern in us crochet terms pattern support of you need or would like it full video tutorial difficulty is easy **materials and tools ** hook 4mm g crochet hook 1 suggested yarn erika knight gossypium cotton 100% cotton 50g/100m approx yarn requirements 1 ball of iced gem 5044 **sizing ** the finished napkin rings measure 6cm by 14cm circumference **gauge ** 16 st and 20 row = 10cm by 10cm but gauge isn t essential as long as you are happy with the size please feel free to send me a message if you have any questions about the pattern as i am more than happy to help you out you are welcome to use this pattern for personal use to make and sell your finished items on a small scale credit to hanjan crochet would be appreciated i d love you to join me at www hanjancrochet com and share my free patterns and tutorials with you i d love for you to find and follow me for more tutorials patterns and inspiration blog - usage instructions complete your purchase on etsy download the pdf file from the confirmation email or your account s download section open the file on any pdf-compatible device and follow the pattern instructions required tools see materials needed -
